HediffDef.label: cisgender
HediffDef.description: This person's gender identity causes them no issue.

HediffDef.label: transgender
HediffDef.description: This person's gender identity causes them some issues.

HediffDef.label: carrying capability
HediffDef.description: This person has the biological capability to carry pregnancies.

HediffDef.label: siring capability
HediffDef.description: This person has the biological capability to sire children.

HediffDef.label: basic reproductive prosthetic (carrying)
HediffDef.description: A basic prosthetic reproductive system that enables carrying pregnancies. Reduces carrying fertility by 30% compared to natural anatomy. Counts as an implant for transhumanist ideology.

HediffDef.label: basic reproductive prosthetic (siring)
HediffDef.description: A basic prosthetic reproductive system that enables siring offspring. Reduces siring fertility by 30% compared to natural anatomy. Counts as an implant for transhumanist ideology.

HediffDef.label: bionic reproductive prosthetic (carrying)
HediffDef.description: A bionic reproductive system that enables carrying pregnancies. Increases carrying fertility by 20% compared to natural anatomy. Provides perfect contraception control when acting as carrier - 100% pregnancy chance when both carrier and sirer have matching bionic prosthetics and both want children, 0% when carrier with bionic wants to avoid pregnancy. Counts as an implant for transhumanist ideology.

HediffDef.label: bionic reproductive prosthetic (siring)
HediffDef.description: A bionic reproductive system that enables siring offspring. Increases siring fertility by 20% compared to natural anatomy. Provides perfect contraception control when acting as sirer - 100% pregnancy chance when both carrier and sirer have matching bionic prosthetics and both want children, 0% when sirer with bionic wants to avoid pregnancy. Counts as an implant for transhumanist ideology.

HediffDef.label: sterilized (carrying)
HediffDef.description: This person has been surgically sterilized and cannot carry pregnancies.

HediffDef.label: sterilized (siring)
HediffDef.description: This person has been surgically sterilized and cannot sire children.

HediffDef.label: reversible sterilization (carrying)
HediffDef.description: This person has a reversible form of sterilization that prevents carrying pregnancies. This can be reversed with appropriate medical procedures.

HediffDef.label: reversible sterilization (siring)
HediffDef.description: This person has a reversible form of sterilization that prevents siring children. This can be reversed with appropriate medical procedures.
